articles.author: Stephen Castle
articles.title: Brexit Brain Drain Delivers Financial Boon to Estonia - The New York Times
articles.description: The former Soviet satellite state is welcoming British companies looking to escape the tangle of regulations and financial obstacles of doing business in Europe.
articles.content: Estonia has received applications for e-Residency, as it is known,from 176 countries, with Britain ranking fourth in the list of non-European Union nations after Russia, Ukraine and China. Being give… [+1424 chars]

articles.author: Marie Morales
articles.title: How Can Digital Twin Earth Help in Saving the World? ESA Develops an Advanced Model to Address Problems Caused by Climate Change - Science Times
articles.description: The European Space Agency is currently developing the Digital Twin Earth, an advanced model that will help scientists better model the future of Earth and eventually solve the problems brought by climate change.
articles.content: The European Space Agency (ESA) is currently developing the Digital Twin Earth, an advanced model that will help scientists better model the future of Earth and eventually solve the problems brought … [+3858 chars]
